cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, and I come out at night. I reflect the Sun's light. What am I?

hints.text: ⚪ I orbit the Earth.
🧀 Sometimes people say I look like cheese.
🐺 Werewolves like me.

cosmos.question: I'm a giant ball of hot gas that gives light and warmth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 Without me, it would be cold and dark.
🌞 Plants need me to grow.
💛 I appear during the day.

cosmos.question: I am a hot, glowing ball of gas, but I'm very far away, so I look like a tiny speck of light at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ There are millions of me in the sky.
🔭 You can see me better with a telescope.
🌃 I twinkle.

cosmos.question: I am the planet we live on, covered in land and water. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 This is where you live!
🌎 I am also called the 'blue planet'.
🌱 Plants and animals live here.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that form a pattern in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 I can be shaped like a bear (Ursa Major).
💫 I'm a group of stars with a name.
🏹 Some are named after mythical creatures.

cosmos.question: I am a huge collection of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our Solar System lives in one. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 Think big - really big!
💫 I can be spiral or elliptical.
🥛 Ours is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a rocky object that orbits the Sun, but I am smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 I can sometimes hit the Earth as a meteor.
🪨 I am a space rock.
👨‍🚀 I am often found between Mars and Jupiter.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that orbits the Sun. When I get close, I have a tail. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of frozen gases, rock and dust.
☄️ I am sometimes called a 'dirty snowball'.
💫 You can only see my tail when I'm close to the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a force that pulls everything towards each other. Without me, we'd float away! What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 Newton is known for discovering me with an apple.
🌍 I keep the Earth in orbit around the Sun.
🧲 I'm like a giant magnet!

cosmos.question: I am a huge cloud of gas and dust in space, where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🎨 I can be very colourful.
👶 Stars are born inside me.
💨 Think of a cloud in space.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I might leave a slimy trail. What am I?

hints.text: 🏡 I carry my house on my back.
🥗 I like to eat lettuce.
🐌 Some people keep me as pets.

ocean.question: I’m a very big fish that lives in the ocean. I have very sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦷 You don't want to get too close to my mouth.
🎬 I've been in a lot of scary movies.
🦈 I have different kinds, like great white.

ocean.question: I'm a creature with eight arms and love to hide in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I use my arms to grab things.
✨ I can change color to blend in.
💪 Eight is my lucky number.

ocean.question: I am a large sea mammal that can be black and white, or all black. I am very smart and live in groups. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am not a whale.
🤸 I like to do tricks in the water.
🔊 I use clicks and whistles to talk.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful formation underwater built by tiny animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🏘️ Many sea creatures call me home.
🧱 I am made of calcium carbonate.
🌞 I am dying due to warming waters.

ocean.question: I am the highest and lowest point of the ocean. I change regularly. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 The moon pulls me up and down.
🌊 Surfers like to ride me.
⏰ I come twice a day.

ocean.question: I'm a ring-shaped group of islands formed by coral reefs around a sunken volcano. What am I?

hints.text: 🏝️ I am a chain of small islands.
🐠 Fish and birds call me home
🌋 I started as a volcano under the sea

ocean.question: I'm a deep, narrow underwater valley. Submarines might explore me. What am I?

hints.text: 🏔️ I'm like a canyon, but underwater.
🌊 I can be formed by erosion or tectonic activity.
⚓ Sometimes, I’m near continents.

ocean.question: I am a stream of water moving through the ocean, caused by wind and temperature differences. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 Wind helps make me.
🌡️ Temperature can change my path.
🧭 I can affect the weather in far away places.

ocean.question: I am a type of plankton that uses sunlight to make food. I am the base of the ocean food web. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am like plants of the sea.
🌞 I use photosynthesis.
🐟 Many creatures eat me.
